titleStmt.title: A remonstrance and declaration of the Generall Assembly of the Church of Scotland, concerning present and imminent dangers, and concerning duties relating thereto.
titleStmt.author: Church of Scotland. General Assembly.

publicationStmt.publisher: Edinburgh, printed by Evan Tyler, printer to the Kings most excellent Majesty, 1649. And re-printed at London for Robert Bostock, dwelling at the sign of the Kings-head in Pauls Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
